prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with blue fur and elegant flowing features.

Imagine a mythical Pokemon that embodies the essence of water and grace.
Design a legendary Pokemon with sweeping movements and a serene presence.

Give me a water-elemental creature with a strong connection to the natural world.
